normalised: Arey yaar, cart abandonment? Happens to the best of us! Maybe Ramesh forgot his wallet again after seeing those tempting Ladoos. Did he get distracted by a cricket match on fifteenth august nineteen forty seven? Happens all the time! Jokes apart, at nine hundred hours, send him a funny reminder!
